```{r setup, include=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r cars, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
param_list_CIY <-
  readr::read_csv("../output/param_list_CIY.csv") %>% 
  dplyr::rename(
    beta1 = x1,
    correct_match_percent = x2
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(
    correct_match_percent >= max(correct_match_percent)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    min_beta1 = 
      format(round(min(beta1), digits = 4), nsmall = 4),
    max_beta1 =
      format(round(max(beta1), digits = 4), nsmall = 4),
    max_correct_match_percent = 
      format(round(max(correct_match_percent), digits = 4), nsmall = 4)
  )
param_list_HB <-
  readr::read_csv("../output/param_list_HB.csv") %>% 
  dplyr::rename(
    beta1 = x1,
    correct_match_percent = x2
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(
    correct_match_percent >= max(correct_match_percent)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    min_beta1 = 
      format(round(min(beta1), digits = 4), nsmall = 4),
    max_beta1 =
      format(round(max(beta1), digits = 4), nsmall = 4),
    max_correct_match_percent = 
      format(round(max(correct_match_percent), digits = 4), nsmall = 4)
  )
```

# Mergers {.tabset}

## Maximum score estimator

```{r, echo=FALSE}

result_for_output <-
  cbind(
    rbind(
      "Standardized Firm age",
      "Standardized Firm-year-level TEU",
      "\\% of correct matches"
    ),
    rbind(
      "1",
      paste("[",param_list_CIY$min_beta1[1] ,",",param_list_CIY$max_beta1[1] , "]", sep = ""),
      param_list_CIY$max_correct_match_percent[1]
      ),
    rbind(
      "1",
      paste("[",param_list_HB$min_beta1[1] ,",",param_list_HB$max_beta1[1] , "]", sep = ""),
      param_list_HB$max_correct_match_percent[1]
      )
    )
result_for_output <-
  rbind(
    c("Regime", "1966-1990", "2005-2022"),
    result_for_output
  )

result_for_output %>%
  kableExtra::kbl(
    format = "latex",
    booktabs = TRUE,
    escape = FALSE,
    linesep = "",
    align = "lccc"
  ) %>%
  kableExtra::save_kable(
    file = here::here("figuretable/maximum_score_estimate.tex")
  )
result_for_output %>% 
  kableExtra::kable() %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling()
```
